name: flat-maze-web
description:
WARNING WebGL2!

Game use GPU, Video card required to launch, also to have it work you need latest browser version, tested on Chrome 76 and Firefox 67 (Windows and Linux), it work.

What is it:

Demo to display thousands-particle collision logic, source code available on my github link

On this page only web-version. Bin(exe) version link https://danilw.itch.io/flat-maze

Game has no sound.

Gameplay:

Goal is finish maze (top right corner). Player has HP, monsters move to plaeyer.

Control:

Keyboard w/a/s/d or arrows, and mosue left/right click.
